content: this is a recipe for the most basic of basic knit socks it s something that i ve come up with over years of making socks i use it as a basis for making socks of every size color and shape feel free to modify it change it and make it your own with just a little bit of tweaking you can use my recipe to make any socks that you would ever want enjoy the gauge and needle size are just a suggestion since this is a recipe it can easily be modified to the needle/yarn combination that you like best one large skein of yarn about 100g is plenty to make a standard adult pair of socks this was originally a series of posts on my blog www ontheneedles com i invite you to come visit me and say howdy
